Posts.Content: MaineCoonKitty wrote: Has anyone done Taxotere and Gemzar?  I had a left side mastectomy from a malignant Phyllodes tumor and my oncologist is suggesting 6, 3 week cycles of Taxotere on Day 1, with Gemzar on Days 1, 8, and 15. Then radiation after chemo. Malignant Phyllodes is so rare that there has not been a lot of studies done with chemo, but she says that the current protocol for follow-up treatment after surgery is similar to what is being done with Sarcoma.  Has anyone taken Taxotere with Gemzar? Dx 4/27/2009, 6cm+, Grade 3, 0/0 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxotere and Gemzar? MaineCoonKitty MaineCoonKitty

Posts.Content: MaineCoonKitty wrote: I LOVE Halloween.  Every year, my hubby and I dress up.  Since I'm going to be bald this year, I've decided to have some fun with it and take advantage of that.  So what are your suggestions for bald characters?  My best friend suggested I go as Brittany Spears when she got crazy and shaved her head or as Sinead O'Connor.  Dx 4/27/2009, 6cm+, Grade 3, 0/0 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
